hero.title: Build your SaaS in days, not months
hero.subtitle: Complete starter kit with authentication, payments, multi-tenancy and everything you need to launch quickly.

mobile.title: Mobile-First PWA
mobile.description: Progressive Web App optimized for mobile devices with offline support and native installation.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Complete support for multiple languages with automatic translations and regional formatting.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Robust authentication, RLS (Row Level Security) and protection against common vulnerabilities.

performance.description: Fast loading, optimized SEO and excellent Core Web Vitals metrics.

testimonials.title: Loved by developers worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers have to say

1.quote: This boilerplate saved me months of work. The setup is impeccable and the documentation is excellent.
1.author: John Smith

2.quote: The best decision I made was to use this template. I launched my SaaS in 2 weeks!
2.author: Sarah Johnson

3.quote: Clean, well-structured code with all the features I needed. Highly recommend!
3.author: Mike Chen

1.question: Can I use this template for commercial projects?
1.answer: Yes! This template comes with an MIT license, allowing commercial use without restrictions.

2.question: How long does it take to set up?
2.answer: With our detailed documentation, you can have the environment set up in less than 30 minutes.

3.question: Do you offer support?
3.answer: Yes, we offer support via Discord and GitHub. Pro customers have access to priority support.

4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
4.answer: Absolutely! There are no contracts or cancellation fees. You can cancel whenever you want.

5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
5.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and international payment methods.
